Author: slimy_bastard
Text: I’m f but I wear pants to school. I usually use a belt because my mum refuses to buy me my actual size (which just makes things worse but I know she’s just trying to help). I wear a shirt so we have to tuck it in, so I’ll just have to get over it. Thanks for the advice tho!

Author: RachAgainstLeMachine
Text: What do you wear for a uniform? Idk if you’re m or f, but if you have to wear a skirt, the best way to make it look good is rolling the top of the skirt and then putting a looser uniform top (at my school it was a polo shirt) on over it!
